News.headline: Emirates FA Cup Second Round Draw
News.page_title: Emirates FA Cup Second Round Draw
News.URL_keywords: Emirates FA Cup Second Round Draw
News.short_description: Dagenham and Redbridge or FC Halifax Town have been drawn to play Swindon Town or Eastleigh in the second round of the Emirates FA Cup.
News.description:
After the 0-0 draw between the Daggers and FC Halifax Town on Saturday, there will be a replay at The Shay to decide who will go on to play Swindon Town or Eastleigh in the second round.

The replay for our game will be played on Tuesday 15th November, with a 7:45pm kick off.

If the Daggers were to get through to the second round of the Emirates FA Cup the game would be played the weekend commencing 2nd December.
